text: Arau arasye ami sihamtaka yenekai pratisthita karaichilo tomalokaka tenekai pratisthita karaa na'i; arau ami sihamtaka dichilo kana, caku arau hrdaya; tathapi'o sihamtara kana, caku arau hrdaya kono kamata aha nachila, yetiya sihamte allahara ayatasamuha asbikara karaichila. Arau yi bisaye sihamte thatta-bidraupa karaichila, se'itorae sihamtaka paraibestana karaile
